item.description:
Please RSVP!

 

No Lesson from IBD again this month.  Kier McDonough will share some of his long and deep experience with CANSLIM.   

The Principal and Portfolio Manager of brìgos capital management, Kier McDonough, will break down and analyze past winners like EMC, AOL, and McDonald's. It is the study of these past winners that will guide you to future success. He will also discuss the current market environment.

 For three years, Kier consulted for Investor’s Business Daily, teaching seminars nationwide.

He will also talk about the market and examine charts of your stock picks.

If you haven't been to an IBD meetup in a while, please come.

 
Who We Are

This IBD Method is for people who are currently learning and applying IBD tools and the CANSLIM Method to their investing.

Only those seeking to learn the IBD CANSLIM Method should attend.

group.name: Boston Investor's Business Daily Meetup Group

item.name: October IBD Meetup
